Car Hire Alicante Airport
The information desk is available 24 hours a day and is located in the check in area. Another information desk is available in the departure area but is only open during busy periods. Telephone - (0)96 691 9100
Car hire at Alicante airport is available from Europa renta car and National Atesa . Both car hire companies provide representatives for your car hire at Alicante airport and are available to book through Spanish Car Hire. Other providers of car hire at Alicante Airport include Avis, Hertz España, Europcar and Sol-Mar SL, all these companies are also represented in the Arrivals area. To obtain a no obligation quote on or to book online in just 4 easy steps, simply select the get a quote button below. Alicante Airport Facilities Money– ATM machines and a post office are available in the airport. A bureau de change is also available for exchange of money Restaurants and Bars - There several bars and restaurants, and also a fast food restaurant. Shopping - Shops include tobacconists, newsagents, gift/jewelers shop, pharmacy, sports and shoe shops, CD and video store, and three duty-free shops. Luggage– A lost property office I located in the main terminal
Disabled Facilities - A designated area outside the terminal building has been provided for dropping off disabled passengers. There are also designated spaces for disabled passengers in the airport car park, opposite the terminal building. The airport has lifts, ramps and disabled toilets; wheelchairs are available on request.
Conference and Business Facilities– The Sala VIP lounge on Departures level 1 offers phone, fax, photocopying and Internet access for business class passengers. The Holiday Inn Alicante-Playa de San Juan located 5km (3 miles) from Alicante airport, can provide conference and business facilities for as many as 150 people.
Airport Car Parking– Car parking is available opposite the airport terminal building. Both long term and short term parking is available at the same airport car park. Charges vary depending on period of stay.
Directions to Alicante Airport - From Alicante, take the Autovia Alicante - Murcia and leave at the airport junction or take the national road 340 to the airport. From Benidorm, take the Autopista A-7.
Public Transport - Taxis are available from the airport, the journey time to Alicante is approximately 15-20 minutes. Buses–A scheduled bus service run every 30 minutes to/from Alicante central bus station.
Address - Alicante Airport, 03071 Alicante, Spain Country code: 34 Airport code: ALC Telephone: (0)96 691 9000 Fax: (0)96 691 9354 Web site: www.aena.es
Please note: All car hire information and pricing is subject to change without notice from the car rental supplier.
